name: ExploreTheWilderness-3D
description:
Hello,

this is my first game i publish and it is in very EarlyAcess!

I hope you enjoy it!

Till yet there isn't much sense with the gameplay but this should come next! 

You can see new features in the devlog!

 You can Pick up Things (not everything) and carry it with you with RightMouseButton                                                                                                                                            

You can also drop it with the RightMouseButton.                                                                           

You can eat and trink apples and Water Bottels with LeftMouseButton, but this costs some Money!                

You can get money by searching Iron ingots in the World and put them on the plate next to this little hood!

These Sticks which you can find in the forest are for the little Campfire behind the bridge, if you put them into ther it starts burning!

There are a few more features but you have to find them on your own!

And you can control the Background Music Volume with +/- ;-)

PS: The Background Music is awesome!

My website: https://philippprogs.wixsite.com/philippprogs

(Icons made by Vectors Market from www.flaticon.com is licensed by CC 3.0 BY)
